p:
Secondary virologic endpoints included time to cessation of viral shedding by virus titer and change from baseline in influenza virus titer.
23 Exploratory virologic endpoints included frequency of treatment-emergent amino acid substitutions (using Sanger sequencing).
24 Baseline samples from both treatment groups were also tested for coinfections (viral and bacterial pathogens), using the BioFire FilmArray Respiratory Panel 2 assay.
25
